Ontario.Montclair High School (California):
Montclair College Preparatory School, also commonly known as "Montclair Prep" was a school located in Van Nuys, Los Angeles, California, near Panorama City. The school taught grades 6 through 12, and later 9-12 only.


== History ==
Founded in 1956, by the late Vernon E. Simpson, Montclair College Preparatory School was one of the oldest private, co-educational, independent, secondary schools in the San Fernando Valley.
